value.stringValue: @[{!sObjCase.OwnerId}] Hi, Eventhough you selected 'Awaiting Customer Response (email required)", the email has not been triggered as no notes have been captured in 'Notes' field. If you still wish to send an 'Awaiting Customer Response' email please do so directly on the related case

@[{!sObjCase.OwnerId}] Hi, it is noted that you attempted to change the case record type from {!RecTypeName} to {!sObjTask.Call_Disposition__c} via Log A Call dispostion. Note: case record types at this level can ONLY be changed from Inquiry to something else. Please make these types of changes directly on the case itself

@[{!sObjCase.OwnerId}] Hi, The Case type cannot be changed when no Contact and Account have been specified on either the Case and/or Task, as all other case types apart from Inquiry cases have this as mandatory fields

rightValue.stringValue: Created new note for a call:

rules.name: Inquiry_2_SR
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14)
rules.label: Inq 2 SR

Flow.description: Manages the reassignment of cases to Task owners when not associated and updates associated cases defined by dispositions in NVM Log a Call

formulas.name: CallNote
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS({!sObjCaseFeed.Body},"Created new note for a call:"),"ACR_Email","ACR_NoEmail")

formulas.name: Status_F
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT({!sObjTask.Status__c})="Awaiting Customer Response (no email)","Awaiting Customer Response",IF(TEXT({!sObjTask.Status__c})="Awaiting Customer Response (email required)","Awaiting Customer Response",IF(TEXT({!sObjTask.Status__c})="Resolved","Resolved",IF(TEXT({!sObjTask.Status__c})="Under Action","Under Action",""))))

Flow.label: NVM Task_Disposition

textTemplates.name: OldCaseValues
